metadata.title: About Us: Our History and Commitment

AboutUs.title: Connecting travelers with Peru
AboutUs.description: Since 2005, we have helped thousands of travelers discover the magic of the Andes, the Amazon, and the cultural wonders of Peru.

proudly-peruvian.title: Proudly 100% Peruvian
proudly-peruvian.slogan: LOCAL COMPANY - PERUVIAN CAPITAL - FAMILY OWNED
proudly-peruvian.description: We are a 100% Peruvian company, founded and operated by families from Cusco with deep roots in our sacred land. We are not a foreign franchise nor do we have international investment: we are authentically Peruvian, with our hearts in the Andes and our souls in our ancient culture.

feature-1.title: Cusco Roots
feature-1.description: Born and raised in Cusco, the capital of the Inca Empire

feature-2.title: Quechua Tradition
feature-2.description: We preserve and share our ancestral traditions

feature-3.title: Inca Culture
feature-3.description: Direct heirs of the greatest civilization in South America

we-are-locals.title: üáµüá™ Why does it matter that we are 100% local?
we-are-locals.subtitle: Our commitment to Peru goes beyond tourism

feature-1.title: Your money stays in Peru
feature-1.description: Unlike foreign franchises that send profits out of the country, every sol you invest with us stays in Peru: in our families, our employees, and our communities.

feature-2.title: Authentic connections
feature-2.description: As locals, we have genuine relationships with Andean communities that have lasted for generations. We are not foreign intermediaries; we are your Peruvian family.

feature-3.title: First-hand knowledge
feature-3.description: Our guides were born here, grew up here, and know every corner of the Andes. We didn't read about Peru in a manual: we live it every day.

feature-4.title: A real commitment to Peru
feature-4.description: We're not here just for the tourist season. This is our home, our future, and the legacy we'll leave to our children. We take care of Peru because it's ours.

our-mission.title: Our Mission
our-mission.description: We facilitate authentic and memorable travel experiences in Peru, connecting travelers from around the world with the best adventures, cultural tours, and unique experiences. We work with reliable local operators to guarantee quality, safety, and respect for the environment.

our-vision.title: Our Vision
our-vision.description-1: To be the leading agency in sustainable and responsible tourism in Peru, internationally recognized for creating transformative experiences that connect travelers with the country's cultural, natural and historical richness.
our-vision.description-2: We aspire to be a bridge between cultures, promoting respect for and preservation of Peruvian heritage while generating a positive impact on the local communities we visit.

why-choose-us.title: Why choose Inca Trail Operator?
why-choose-us.subtitle: What makes us different from other agencies

feature-1.title: 100% Local and Family-owned
feature-1.description: Operated by native Cusco families with authentic connections to local communities. We're not a foreign franchise, we're your family in Peru.

feature-2.title: Small Groups
feature-2.description: M√°ximo 8-12 personas por grupo. Experiencias √≠ntimas y personalizadas, nunca tours masivos. Tu gu√≠a conoce tu nombre, no tu n√∫mero.

feature-3.title: Ethics and Sustainability
feature-3.description: Certified fair wages, respected load limits, carbon-neutral operations and direct reinvestment in local communities.

feature-4.title: No Hidden Fees
feature-4.description: Transparent and direct pricing. When you book with us, you eliminate intermediaries and your money goes directly to local communities.

feature-5.title: Total Flexibility
feature-5.description: Customizable tours tailored to your needs. Private dates available, dietary adjustments, pace adaptable to your fitness level.

feature-6.title: Real 24/7 Support
feature-6.description: Personalized attention before, during, and after your trip. Direct emergency numbers, not automated call centers.

start-adventure.title: Start your Peruvian adventure
start-adventure.description: Thousands of travelers have trusted us to discover Peru. Now it's your turn to live an unforgettable experience with a 100% local company.
